billing_commitment_none: You do not have a commitment on your {{serviceName}} subscription. You can get a discount today if you add a commitment to your {{serviceType}} subscription.
billing_commitment_commit_again_descript: You are currently subscribed to your {{serviceName}} subscription until {{endDate}}. You can continue to get a discount by re-subscribing to your {{serviceType}} service.
billing_commitment_payment_method_none: You do not have a valid payment method.
billing_commitment_summary_description_p: From {{renewDate}}, your {{serviceName}} service will be automatically renewed every month until {{engagementEndDate}}.
billing_commitment_summary_description_u: From {{renewDate}}, you will be subscribed to your {{serviceName}} service until {{engagementEndDate}}.
billing_commitment_summary_description_p: The amount will be taken from your default payment method: {{paymentMethodType}} {{paymentMethodName}}
billing_commitment_success: The service subscription request has been processed.
billing_commitment_success_purchase: Please finalise the payment for your purchase order.
billing_commitment_summary_description_e: After {{endDate}}, your service subscription will be automatically renewed for the same commitment period.
billing_commitment_summary_description_p: After {{engagementEndDate}} your {{serviceName}} subscription will automatically be renewed for the same commitment period and payment option.
billing_commitment_summary_description_u: After {{engagementEndDate}} your {{serviceName}} subscription will automatically be renewed for the same commitment period and payment option.
